tweets.text:
In the new EU strategic framework on health and safety at work, the @EU_Social will provide updated guidelines, incl. on training, protocols, surveillance and monitoring, for protecting workers against exposure to HMPs by '22. 

Read our joint position https://t.co/1297SPUtPz https://t.co/vuEoitN06N

“It is not just workers’ physical well-being we have to protect, we must also our look after their mental health that has been severely affected by the pandemic. Even before the pandemic, mental health problems affected around 84 million people in the EU” says @NicolasSchmitEU https://t.co/fNRXcATPkz

Today, we will present a new framework on health & safety at work! 👨🏼‍🏭👷🏾‍♀️

🔴 Follow the press conference at 13:00:
https://t.co/I62FOWjWCv

#SocialRights #OSH https://t.co/gxyA3CBmob

#TIC Council & @DEKRA_Konzern are Campaign Partners of @EU_OSHA #EUhealthyworkplaces.

Missed our webinar?

👉See our highlights, recording & presentation slides 
https://t.co/KViyboGcUW https://t.co/zC25s1XQhZ

We thank Brenda O'Brien (@EU_OSHA) for presenting the highlights of the Healthy Workplaces Campaign: LIGHTEN THE LOAD - safety lessons for chemical distributors’ workplaces

Watch out for our upcoming events after the summer: https://t.co/5AH70xZCpU
